56894.「この向こう 研究室ある！\n 今から 扉 開けるプッケ！:
This is the research lab! I'll open the door,
oink!

56895.「風の真珠…… 風の真珠！\n アケレロ アケロレ プッケッケ！: Wind Pearl... Wind Pearl! Snort, snort! Oink!

56897.<if_woman>「おねーちゃん 見ろプケ！\n ここが 花 錬金してた研究室:
Lookie here, oink! This is the lab where the
flowers were alchemized! I promised to you
here, oink!

56898.<if_woman>「おねーちゃんに あげる花 この奥！\n ついてこいプッケ！: Flowers for you! Follow me, oink!

56901.「道案内 感謝するぞ……！ お前が\n エテーネの錬金術師を 探しているのを知り:
Hey, thanks for leadin' the way! I knew you
were searching for Ethene's alchemist, so I
thought I'd follow you.

56902.「テンスの花を作りだそうとする者の\n 存在に気づき…… 追い続けて 数十年。\:
I've been searching for the person who created
those flowers for YEARS... and look! I
finally find their lab!

56903.「よもや 清き水の洞くつでしか咲かぬ花を\n このような場所で 咲かせるとは……:
You know... how could a flower that only
blooms in that one cave bloom in a place like
this? I knew that girl was somethin' else...

56904.「じゃが ヤツの努力も ここまで！\n すべてのテンスの花を この世から消し去る:
Well, too bad for you! As a sorcerer myself, I
cannot allow any Tens Flowers to exist!
They all must be destroyed!

56905.「この地に咲いた テンスの花は\n 魔導鬼ベゼブーが 焼き尽くしてくれるわ！:
I, the great Sorcerer Bezubu, will burn these
flowers until nothing but ash remains!

56908.「テンスの花は 誰にも渡さん！\n ……ジャマをするなら\n お前も 焼き尽くし:
No one is getting any Tens Flowers! If you get
in my way, I'll burn you to ash, too!!

56909.「すべてのテンスの花を この世から抹消する！\n それが 我ら魔導鬼一族の使命じ:
I will wipe out all Tens Flowers! That is the
mission of the Demon Tribe!

56910.「テンスの花は 誰にも渡さん！\n ……ジャマをするなら\n お前も 焼き尽くし:
No one is getting any Tens Flowers! If you get
in my way, I'll burn you to ash, too!!

56912.「も…申し訳……ございません……\n 偉大なる 大魔王……マデサゴーラさまぁ……:
F...forgive me... Great Demon King...
Madesagora....! Gg... gggh!!

56914.<if_woman>「ボク 平気。\n 錬金術で すごく丈夫に 作ってもらった！:
I'm fine! Alchemy made me super strong!
Come over here, oink!

56917.<if_woman>「この花が おねーちゃんに 渡したかった花！\n 輝くテンス:
This flower is for you, oink! Shiny Tens
Flower, oink!

56918.「エテーネ村の 巫女さまに言われて作った\n 聖なるチカラが いっぱいの花！\n:
The Ethene Village priestess told how to make
this flower! Full of sacred power! It can
break the Galapagod's curse, oink!

56919.<if_woman>「おねーちゃんの<kyodai_rel3> この花 錬金する:
To alchemize this flower, your <kyodai_rel3>
traveled the world to find somewhere just like
the Old Spring. This place is just the same!

56920.<if_woman>「おねーちゃん！\n 輝くテンスの花 おねーちゃんにやる！<: I'll give you this shiny Tens Flower, oink!

56921.<cs_pchero>は\n輝くテンスの花（だいじなもの）を 受け取った！<me:
<cs_pchero> received
the Shining Tens Flower (Key Item)!<me 60>

56922.「この錬金釜は ボクが\n イッショウさんに返すように 言われてるプケ！:
I'm supposed to return this alchemy pot to
Mr. Issho, oink!

56923.<if_woman>「ボク 錬金釜 届けにいく！\n おねーちゃん！ この手紙:
I'll go deliver it now! After you read the
letter, please come to Ethene Village! Oink!

56924.<cs_pchero>は\n<kyodai_rel3>からの手紙（だいじなもの）:
<cs_pchero> received
a letter from their <kyodai_rel3> (Key Item)!<me 60>

56925.<if_woman><center>姉ちゃんへ。\nやっと 錬金できたよ 輝くテ:
To my dear <if_woman>sister<else>brother<endif>...
I finally managed to alchemize a Shining Tens
Flower! You need this, don't you?

56926.<if_woman><center>おいらは あの日 姉ちゃんと別れてから ずっ:
Ever since we were separated, I wondered if I
should even still be alive... or why I ended
up in this time.

56927.<if_woman><center>でも アバさまに 姉ちゃんが生きてることを\:
But when Abba told me that you were alive, I
knew what my mission was... and finally
understood why I came to this time.

56928.<center>普通のテンスの花より ずっと強いチカラを持つ\nテンスの花を 何:
My mission was to alchemize a stronger Tens
Flower... and it took me years... even decades
to perfect it.

56929.<center>おいら いつも いいかげんだったけど\nまわりの人が 助けてくれ:
I've always been a bit lazy, but... thanks to
everyone around me helping, I was able
to do it.

56930.<if_woman><center>姉ちゃんは すごい使命を持ってるんだってね。:
I heard that you're on some big quest, so I'm
glad if my alchemy can help you, even if
just a little.

56931.<if_woman><center>本当は 自分の手で渡したかったけど ごめん。:
I really wanted to hand it to you myself, but
I'm sorry... I don't have time. But I will say
this. Good luck on your quest, <if_woman>sis<else>bro<endif>!
